name: The Otter Ways
description:
BECOME AN OTTER
After the fall of two kingdoms, many creatures settled in the valley. Now one otter is also there, and it can reach all places between the mountains: on the peaks, underground and underwater.

FIND YOUR WAY
Run, jump, swim - explore caves, lakes, ruins and floating islands. See hidden locations, wander between flowers and rocks, admire beautiful nature and the remains of man's world. If you can't beat some part, you can always retreat and find another solution.

FIGHT
Stand in knightly duels against all foul creatures that settled there. Find (or craft!) better sword and armour, or use other items to launch surprising attacks in unique tactical combat.

SURVIVE
Keep exploring and fighting, finding items and combining them to keep your wounds, hunger and illness in check. In the beginning, all you need are fish in the lake, but sooner or later you will have to find rare plants and minerals.

FEATURES
- survival system (health, hunger, air, illness)
- original combat system (using sword stances based on historical martial arts)
- 3 diverse pixel art environments to explore
- 5 distinct weapons
- 6 enemies
- 80+ items to collect and craft
